Package com.heno.controller

Class EmployeeController

java.lang.Object
com.heno.controller.EmployeeController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/employees") public class EmployeeController extends Object
Rest controller for managing employees.

    • getAllEmployees

      @GetMapping("/getAll") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAllEmployees()
      Endpoint to retrieve all employees from the repository.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the list of employees if successful, INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR if an exception occurs.

    • addEmployee

      @PostMapping("/add") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addEmployee(EmployeeAddDto employeeAddDto)
      Endpoint to add a new employee.
      Parameters:
      employeeAddDto - The SignUpDto containing information for creating a new user.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity indicating success or failure with appropriate HTTP status codes.

    • editEmployee

      @PostMapping("/edit") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> editEmployee(EmployeeEditDto employeeEditDto)
      Endpoint to edit an existing employee.
      Parameters:
      employeeEditDto - The UserEditDto containing information for editing an existing user.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity indicating success or failure with appropriate HTTP status codes.

    • getAllEmployeeRoles

      @GetMapping("/getAllRoles") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAllEmployeeRoles()
      Endpoint to retrieve all roles.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the list of Roles if successful, INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR if an exception occurs.
